snippet: The verdict was the latest in a crackdown by the authorities against gays.
abstract: Egyptian court sentences eight men to three years in prison for appearing in video of alleged same-sex wedding party; consensual same-sex relations are not explicitly prohibited in Egypt, but other laws are used to imprison gay men.
lead_paragraph: The verdict was the latest in a crackdown by the authorities against gays.

headline.main: Egypt Sentences 8 in Connection With Same-Sex Wedding
headline.print_headline: Egypt Sentences 8 in Connection With Same-Sex Wedding

keywords.value: Same-Sex Marriage, Civil Unions and Domestic Partnerships
keywords.name: subject
